page.title: 20CARNIVAL DAY
page.content:
Each year in Coventry we have a carnival in June.It is a time of fun.A procession of decorated lorries leaves the Memorial Park and makes its way through the city centre.Big crowds line the route.On the backs of the lorries are men and women dressed in funny clothes-I saw a man dressed up as a baby.Often a band on a lorry will play throughout the afternoon.Other people taking part will walk alongside the lorries collecting money from the spectators,the proceeds going to various charitable organisations.
PAGES BY : CALUDON CASTLE COMP. FRANK WHITTLE PRIMARY SACRED HEART PRIMARY ST.GREGORY'S RC PRIMARY WALSGRAVE C OF E PRIMARY
